page.title: 18INTERVIEW:PEBMARSH VILLAGER
page.content: Q. How long have you lived here? A. Since 1902 - That's 83 years. Q. Where were you born? A. I was born in Sutton,Surrey. Q. How is Pebmarsh different from when you were little? A. It was so much quieter.There were only cart tracks when we came here. I can remember men picking stones from the fields to make the first roads. Q. Did you go to the same school as your father? A. No.He went to Sutton,I went to Pebmarsh. Q. Where did you work? A. I did an apprenticeship in a Halstead garage.Then I joined the Royal Flying Corps.After the war I went to work in my own garage. Q. When did you have your first car? A. 1920,but I had motorbike in 1914.
